com.yantra.api.ydm

Interface reprintCarrierLabel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YDMApi, YIFApi

    public interface reprintCarrierLabel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document reprintCarrierLabel(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The reprintCarrierLabel API reprints carrier label for a container whose label is already printed once.

    • Method Detail

      • reprintCarrierLabel

        org.w3c.dom.Document reprintCarrierLabel(YFSEnvironment env,
                                         org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                  throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                         java.rmi.RemoteException

        The reprintCarrierLabel API reprints carrier label for a container whose label is already printed once. The API reprints label for only those containers whose shipment or load require carrier integration. The API supports reprinting Pickup Summary Barcode Report label also, through Pierbridge Integration for a manifest. It can print it once the Manifest is closed with Pierbridge Integration.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        The following user exit is called from YCS:
        com.yantra.ycs.japi.ue.YCSreprintCarrierLabelUserExit

        Events Raised:
        Raised during the transaction REPRINT_CARRIER.

          ON_SUCCESS:
            This event is raised upon successful execution of reprintCarrierLabel.
            Data published - YDM_REPRINT_CARRIER.ON_SUCCESS.xml

        Pierbridge Label URL Support in API Output: Yes

        UPS Pickup Summary Label Support: Yes

        Details on UPS Pickup Summary Label Support: UPS Pickup Summary Label could be printed from this API by passing the ReprintLabelLevel as PICKUP_SUMMARY. Please note that the ManifestNo and ManifestKey are mandatory API attributes if PICKUP_SUMMARY is being printed. Please refer to the input, output and ON_SUCCESS XMLs for further information. Also, BOTH_FWD_AND_RET ReprintLabelLevel will also work as BOTH already available. PrintBuffer for the PICKUP_SUMMARY will also be available in the API output if configured. This API is called as a part of the PrintPickupSummaryLabel service in the Manifest process model. This will only work with Sterling Pierbridge Adaptor.

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Output Template Support: No

        Database Extensibility Support: None

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: Yes
        Versions: ver32, ver40 and ver45.

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
